snippet: Andy Roddick, the face of men’s tennis in the United States for over a decade, has a bounce in his step even as his career draws to a close after announcing his retirement.
abstract: Karen Crouse On Tennis column observes that Andy Roddick, the face of men’s tennis in the United States for over a decade, has a bounce in his step even as his career draws to a close after announcing that the United States Open will be his last tournament.
lead_paragraph: Andy Roddick, the face of men’s tennis in the United States for over a decade, has a bounce in his step even as his career draws to a close after announcing his retirement.

headline.seo: At U.S. Open, Andy Roddick Is Having His Last Laugh
headline.main: Roddick Is Having His Last Laugh
headline.print_headline: A Long Goodbye: Playful as Ever As He Plays Out The String
